# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. For this exceptional opportunity, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $99. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the difference it can make in your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
